Name: ADONIS
About the game: Adonis is a stylized, whimsical open world action game that focuses on fantasy combat! Get ready for an intense adventure in the open world of Candala! Massive, functional & stylized (medieval & post-medieval) environments Open world setting that features Everhaven Castle, The Ruins of Candala (Castle Ruins), and the Everhaven Caves Check your ranking monthly on our official website (link from main menu) Developed & Published by Lorenzo Entertainment Lead Game Designer: Michael L. Fiorentino Gutierrez Lead Programmer: Samuel Hall Assistant Director of Server Operations: David Conta Head of Community: Carlos Velez HR Director: Emily Andrews Head Online Gameplay Administrator: Alex Bay Creative Consultant: Cameron Rogers * NOTE: The initial November 13, 2020 Early Access retail release of 'Adonis' does not currently support RTX & DLSS features. Full RTX & DLSS implementation will be released on February 26, 2021. The Steam retail price for 'Adonis' will not be raised after RTX/DLSS implementation and the retail price will not be raised after full Steam release (October 1, 2021).
